captionId.Wiki: ID of the text to be displayed

tableId.Wiki: First ID (male) in the list of items to select. The command type is [Slider: Text ID of minimum label (n) and maximum label (n + 1), Color: ID of color table, Grid or text: First ID of character make list item, Other: Ignore]

previewMode.Wiki: Display mode of the character model displayed in preview

tableId2.Wiki: For women with table ID. If -1, refer to for men

refFaceParamId.Wiki: Face param ID of the matching destination for matching to XX

refTextId.Wiki: Display text ID for fit to XX

helpTextId.Wiki: 1-line help text ID (-1: Get 1-line help with item text ID). Basically, item text ID = 1 line help text ID, but if you want to overwrite part of it, specify it with this parameter.

unlockEventFlagId.Wiki: Event flag to unlock this item (0: invalid value). Invalid value will always be unlocked
